definitions.definition: A short speech , spoken directly at the audience at the end of a play
The performer who gives this speech
A brief oration or script at the end of a literary piece ; an afterword
A component of a computer program that prepares the computer to return from a routine .

main_definition: A short speech , spoken directly at the audience at the end of a play
secondary_definitions: The performer who gives this speech
A brief oration or script at the end of a literary piece ; an afterword
( computing ) A component of a computer program that prepares the computer to return from a routine .
